name: Irang: the last hope
description:
Game Universe

Joseon, a magical kingdom honoring the Four Deities. However, it is in chaos due to the corruption of the ruling class and the repeated rebellions of the ruled class. The nobles, in an attempt to steal the power of the Four Deities, have unleashed the sealed evil spirits, bringing various calamities to Joseon. Amidst this turmoil, the Yellow Dragon, a servant of the Azure Dragon, chooses 'Irang', a girl of pure heart, as the last hope of Joseon. Irang, endowed with the power of the Yellow Dragon, must overcome all the challenges of the civil service examination and liberate the Four Deities.

Game Introduction

"Irang: The Last Hope" is a very unique Metroidvania style single-player game. The main characters of this game are a girl 'Irang' and a haetae 'Haru' who received power from the Yellow Dragon. Their goal is to liberate the Four Deities to survive in a world where everything has collapsed and perished. The gameplay is very unique, and the player helps them pass various tests and overcome obstacles to liberate the Four Deities on their journey.

Game Features

ㆍComplex and challenging level design: Each level has a unique and complex design, offering new challenges to players. Demonstrate your true skills as you overcome each level.


ㆍUnique game mechanics: Players need to develop their own strategies using various game mechanics such as the timeline of light, mirage, and custom skills. These unique mechanics add a new dimension to the gameplay.

ㆍUnique world set in the Joseon era: "Irang: The Last Hope" is set in the serene and beautiful Joseon era. This world offers players a unique and attractive experience. In this world where mythical beings like the Four Deities and evil spirits exist and magic is realized, players can write their own destiny.
